title: The Villainess That Got Pregnant With the Crown Prince’s Child Decided to Run Away - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Healers   Magic   Misunderstandings   Multiple Transported Individuals   Otome Game   Pregnancy   R-15   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Souls   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 葉柚
description:
Rachel is the villainess that got pregnant with the crown prince’s kid, she lived a life full of happiness.

However, as soon as she got pregnant, memories of her past life as a villainess started coming back to her. Realizing this, Rachel decided to run away from the crown prince.>
